blogPost.excerpt: Apart from Paperform's in-house experts, we reached out to the design community to gain insights into what makes a good form great 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful
blogPost.body: Apart from Paperform's in-house experts, we reached out to the design community to gain insights into what makes a good form great 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful
blogPost.title: Form Design Ebook - A comprehensive guide on why form design is critical to UX.
blogPost.author: Dean McPherson

localize.description: 除了Paperform的内部专家外，我们还联系了设计社区，以深入了解如何使一个好的表单变得更棒 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful。
localize.tagline: 全面指导为什么表单设计对用户体验至关重要。

localize.description: 除了Paperform的內部專家外，我們還聯繫了設計社區，以深入瞭解如何使一個好的表單變得更棒 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful。
localize.tagline: 全面指導爲什麼表單設計對用戶體驗至關重要。

previous.excerpt: 😺 PH Launch KIT is an all in one product for makers, indiehackers and product owners who feel frustrated with launching on Product Hunt. 2 months on R&D, detailed 25-step launch guide, 1300+ Design Assets, exclusive community for creators and more!
previous.title: PH Launch KIT - Everything you need for a successful PH Launch! (Unofficial)

next.excerpt: Duffel makes travel selling easy, fast, and developer-friendly. Our API enables any travel business to start selling flights from a network of leading airlines in minutes, not months.
next.title: Duffel - The best API to sell flights online

localize.description: Duffel让旅游销售变得简单、快捷、方便开发者。我们的API使任何旅游企业能够在几分钟内，而不是几个月内开始销售领先航空公司网络的航班。
Duffel讓旅遊銷售變得簡單、快捷、方便開發者。我們的API使任何旅遊企業能夠在幾分鐘內，而不是幾個月內開始銷售領先航空公司網絡的航班。
